type.name: org.gradle.language.nativeplatform.DependentSourceSet
type.description: * A source set that depends on one or more {@link org.gradle.nativeplatform.NativeDependencySet}s to be built.

method.name: getLibs
method.description: * The libraries that this source set requires.

method.name: getPreCompiledHeader
method.description: * Returns the pre-compiled header configured for this source set. * * @return the pre-compiled header

method.name: lib
method.description:
* Adds a library that this source set requires. This method accepts the following types: * *
    *
  • A {@link org.gradle.nativeplatform.NativeLibrarySpec}
    • *
  • A {@link org.gradle.nativeplatform.NativeDependencySet}
    • *
  • A {@link LanguageSourceSet}
    • *
  • A {@link java.util.Map} containing the library selector.
    • *
* * The Map notation supports the following String attributes: * *
    *
  • project: the path to the project containing the library (optional, defaults to current project)
    • *
  • library: the name of the library (required)
    • *
  • linkage: the library linkage required ['shared'/'static'] (optional, defaults to 'shared')
    • *

method.name: setPreCompiledHeader
method.description: * Sets the pre-compiled header to be used when compiling sources in this source set. * * @param header the header to precompile

property.name: libs
property.description: * The libraries that this source set requires.

property.name: preCompiledHeader
property.description: * Returns the pre-compiled header configured for this source set. * * @return the pre-compiled header
